name: Good... Bye
description:
In Good... Bye you play as Agent Swan who was captured by a super villain by the name of Maria Malice, as she tried to evade a series of overly elaborate death traps which come in the form of escape room puzzles motivated by well, death.

Credits: (Listed in Game)

  • A Game By Sam Richards
  • Featuring:
    • Illustration by Steven Sugar
    • Music by Joel Whitaker
    • Sound Design by Toby Misselbrook
  • Staring:
    • Tessa Racked as Maria Malice
    • Zindzi Swan as Agent Swan

Instructions: (Listed in Game)

  • WASD/Mouse or Joysticks to Move
  • Space or A to Jump
  • Left Click/Trigger to Pick Up/Put Down
  • Right Click/Trigger to Throw

You can follow Steven at http://stevensugar.tumblr.com/

And find more games at http://mythalore.com/

Made for Wizard Jam 5
